entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023
